title: Bug report : PvP.net patcher karnel ... i post this in general discussion , maybe someone will see
body:
So ... first, sorry im french from new caledonia in oce , my english will be bad . 
I'm posting this report 'cause since the patch 5.20 my pc can't run League of legend. 
And apparently it happen the same problem to some of my friends. 
Can riot fix this problem ? :3
